data.name: Analog Clock
data.details: Pellentesque habitant morbi tristique senectus et netus et malesuada fames ac turpis egestas. Vestibulum tortor quam, feugiat vitae, ultricies eget, tempor sit amet, ante. Donec eu libero sit amet quam egestas semper. Aenean ultricies mi vitae est. Mauris placerat eleifend leo.
data.description: In the mid 1950’s Braun and Dieter Rams introduced German modern industrial design into the common home and office. The products have influenced current companies such as Apple. The Travel Alarm Clock is no exception. Seen most recently influencing the design of the Apple Watch. Crescendo alarm and quiet German quartz movement. Batteries included.

data.name: Boskke Cube

data.description: The Boskke Cube is a self-watering planter that is perfect for herbs and houseplants. Recommended for both green and brown thumbs, simply fill the cube with water and let the plant absorb the water through the terra-cotta base and have fresh herb ingredients for any meal.

user_reviews.data: This will go great with my Hoodie that I ordered a few weeks ago.
Love this shirt! The ninja near and dear to my heart. <3

This clock won the Red dot award for product design in 2012 and an IF gold award for product design in 2013. Batteries included

user_reviews.data: The ninja silhouette is one of my favorite designs. This is a great product.

data.name: Medium Notebook
data.details: The cover is made in Japan from starch-pressed cotton. Four color ways that fade with use and stay true to the wabi sabi tradition. The steel binding is set on the back cover to create a nice spine and the versatile paper is ecologically made and chlorine free. Pages are printed with 1x1mm blue graph paper.
